abstract: UBS of Switzerland on Tuesday reported a profit of 2 billion Swiss francs in the second quarter, as investment banking income rose.
snippet: UBS of Switzerland on Tuesday reported a profit of 2 billion Swiss francs in the second quarter, as investment banking income rose.
lead_paragraph: UBS of Switzerland on Tuesday reported a profit of 2 billion Swiss francs in the second quarter, as investment banking income rose, Bettina Wassener reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: UBS Posts $1.9 Billion Profit in Second Quarter

abstract: Even as investors applauded the mostly positive results of recent stress tests of European banks, central bankers and regulators reached a preliminary agreement Monday on new standards to reinforce the stability of the global financial system.
snippet: Even as investors applauded the mostly positive results of recent stress tests of European banks, central bankers and regulators reached a preliminary agreement Monday on new standards to reinforce the stability of the global financial system.
lead_paragraph: Even as investors applauded the mostly positive results of recent stress tests of European banks, central bankers and regulators reached a preliminary agreement Monday on new standards to reinforce the stability of the global financial system, Eric Dash and Nelson D. Schwartz report in The New York Times.

headline.main: Central Bankers Reach Early Deal on Global Standards

abstract: Bank of America on Monday appointed a former colleague of Sallie Krawcheck as its Merrill Lynch global wealth management unit’s new chief investment officer, Reuters reported.
snippet: Bank of America on Monday appointed a former colleague of Sallie Krawcheck as its Merrill Lynch global wealth management unit’s new chief investment officer, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America on Monday appointed a former colleague of Sallie Krawcheck as its Merrill Lynch global wealth management unit’s new chief investment officer, Reuters reported.

headline.main: BofA’s Krawcheck Adds to Executive Team
